enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Freshmen and Sophomores
title: WCAS PSYCH 101-6-20 First-Year Seminar
class_attributes:
WCAS First-Year Seminar

Attendance at 1st class mandatory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class looks at the way people reason about everyday objects and events. Topics may include: human concepts of individual objects and their categories, thinking about mathematics and probability, and the role of language in thinking.

subject: PSYCH
